website_summaries.verdict: A great choice for lighter-skinned customers.
pros: Made from natural rice with amazing absorption properties
Fits easily inside a purse or pocket
cons: Can leave powder residue on your face, but this seems to be a rare occurrence

customer_reviews.title: READ PLEASE
customer_reviews.text: I order the 3 packages because I had a lot of time using this product and is the best I found, I bought diferent ones, the others take out the shine but you have to apply it by touching your face with the sheet or just doesn't work and that's it. This paladio sheet you have to slide it on your face and how it has rice powder, you look like when you refresh your makeup. Is amazing when you are working but doesn't have time to go check on your make up.
customer_reviews.author: Lirio torres

customer_reviews.title: Hate the Powder
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to try something different, I usually stick to clean and clear oil blotting sheets. I shouldn’t have strayed. The paper isn’t bad at oil blotting but I hate the powder. It falls when you’re taking the sheet out and get all over your clothes the paper is kinda ruff to me just wasn’t for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ebony

customer_reviews.title: Powdery patches of translucent
customer_reviews.text: My first purchase of this product was through Sephora. The product worked fabulous for me I got compliments on how nice my skin looks. Then I re-ordered via Amazon and it doesn’t apply the same the powder comes off and clumps leaving powder patches. Could the pack I received be old or exposed to too much heat? Anyone experience this?
customer_reviews.author: E. Surf City

customer_reviews.title: Forever convert! Matte, not fake, and no color transfer for this pale skin!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the rice paper tissues is Translucent. By far better than any other facial blotting papers I've used. Love that the papers are not flimsy. One paper - edge to edge - does my whole face. I use it after my tinted SPF moisturizer and cream blush in the morning as a final touch before spritzing with rose water and dashing out the door. Perfectly matte and decreases pore visibility. I have my mom's pale Irish skin and no color transfer. Seriously has cut down on my makeup time by 5-10 minutes. I re-use around noon and am good until about 5. Forever convert!
customer_reviews.author: BostonChic35

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: OK! For years I've been trying to find something to help absorb the oil on my face.. and when I say oil, I'm talking about a pepperoni pizza, amount of oil. I use Coty Air spun and L'Oréal infallible which are fantastic at keeping the oil at bay but...in the middle of day I could feel my face just waiting to smear. So I found these rice papers and they have raving reviews! Well, let me tell you! amazing! absorbs 100%, doesn't leave face looking cakey AND makeup stays on even after I use one of these glorious papers! These are a purse staple now! if you have an oily face, GET THESE YOU WONT REGRET IT!
customer_reviews.author: Sophie Rice

customer_reviews.title: Great at absorbing oil to deshine your face!
customer_reviews.text: My mom used to have these in the 1980s and I always wondered what they were for. Now having inherited oily greasebucket skin, I surely know what blotting papers are for! I decided to get a pack of these to degrease myself and they work great. It lifts up the oil and deshines me quite well. I love that they are powdered rather than just thin sheer paper like most other blotting paper brands. These are a good alternative to the shiseido pureness blotting papers which I used to use but are extremely expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great for removing excess oil from the face
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for 27 years. I Love, Love, Love it. It is really great fro removing excess oil from the face. I have fair skin and I use the translucent. It leaves no visible residue on my face. I use this before applying powder to my face and for touch ups removing oil during the day. It is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Traci LM

customer_reviews.title: They work so much better than what you get from local stores
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product and how it absorbs oil - leaving your face look and feel like you haven't just used a bottle of shoe polish on it lol. Really though, they do leave you with a nice matte-like appearance. One usually does the job fine. I dunno how I lived without these before. The only complaint I have with them is that they tend to tear a little too easily at times while pulling them out of dispenser or while trying to use them. Don't let that stop you from trying these though by any means!
customer_reviews.author: Vortec

customer_reviews.title: So much better than Clean & Clear blotting sheets
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only used the classic blue oil blotting sheets by Clean & Clear and these Palladio sheets are soooo much better! I normally have to use at least 3 sheets to soak up all of the oil on my face, but with these I only need 1. They are larger sized and oils do not seep through as much so I can actually use both sides. And the amount of makeup transfer isn’t as much. A+!!!!!!!! Definitely repurchasing.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: 2 blotting sheets for the price of one!
customer_reviews.text: Tried these on a whim and they're greeeaaatttt! One sheet is double the size of most blotting sheets. One side is just paper and the other side has a light dusting of powder ( I ordered translucent because I'm suuppeerrr pale). Work great, fit easily in your purse and they're affordable. Give them a try.
customer_reviews.author: H. MilesTop Contributor: Travel

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love these. They’re natural and simply rice powder. They do a great job at blotting. If you’re extra oily you may need two wipes to get you back to matte but I think the fact that it’s natural and does such a great job makes them extremely worth it. I will add though that I’m pretty light (n3 in L’Oréal truematch) and this doesn’t affect my coloring.
customer_reviews.author: Ayoka Leaderman

customer_reviews.title: Tried it all - love these!
customer_reviews.text: I think this is such a clever idea and it works really well. I don't use the non-powder side because I prefer the powder. I don't feel it leaves any powdery look on my skin, but that could be because I have fair skin. My skin gets very oily and one blotter removes all the oil. I also wear foundation everyday and it does not mess up my makeup. Will re-order for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Nic

customer_reviews.title: Nice for freshening up
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying these for years. My skin is oily and I love to blot with these to feel less greasy. I also like the light powder finish they give me. I don't have to buy unhygienic face powder or worry about powder being caked on because the powder finish on these papers is very very light. You can't see the powder but you know it's there because these give your face a nice finished perfected look.
customer_reviews.author: Diane B.

customer_reviews.title: Everything 's alright without an oily face!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I do not wear much make up now that I am on my 40's. However the natural oil your skin brings can be too much, specially on hot days. So there are so amazing, the absorbency is marvelous, they are super soft and the packaging is thin and tiny which if your bf/husband is looking through your purse (not that they should but in case} They would have no idea how you keep either your natural face or make up face so not oily. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Monse Herivel

customer_reviews.title: Translucent comes off in eyebrows
customer_reviews.text: Not a good look on me. I'm not sure if it's just the translucent because I usually get beige, but this comes off on eyebrows bad and I barely even have any. Really a pain when you use pencil. Once it attaches to your face, it's not coming off without a heavy rub, and then you get to do your brows all over again.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Really good
customer_reviews.text: These are very good quality. They were purchased by my young adult daughter and she has gotten them in the past at Sally Beauty Supply. My daughter says they are thicker than other paper blotting sheets and a better buy even though there are fewer in the package. These sheets blot well and do not tear easily.
customer_reviews.author: Janet/ Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My new holy grail
customer_reviews.text: Other oil blotting sheets make your face blotchy and all gross after but NOT THIS ONE!!! After you blot, it looks like you just powdered again without powdering again. It’s a beautiful matte finish that doesn’t make your face blotchy at all. And it keeps your face matte. The rice powder is really powdery, each sheet you take out, the powder flies out. That’s how concentrated and beautiful it is. I would give it 10 stars if I could. Finally found a cheap oil blotting sheet that actually works and makes your make up looks great mid-day.
customer_reviews.author: Han Mac

customer_reviews.title: They work!
customer_reviews.text: I've used other brands of face blotting sheets - these are, by far, the best I've ever used. Both sides can be used - while this sounds funny, one side blots but the opposite side has a rice powder on it. So, while blotting, the powder is being applied. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: The original
customer_reviews.text: These are the original rice paper product that started the entire trend
customer_reviews.author: Jason Andrew

customer_reviews.title: To powdery. First time using this.
customer_reviews.text: It’s very powdery . I know it’s a rice paper but didn’t think all the power would be flying everyone in the air just taking it out from the pocket. won’t buy this again. But the rice powder covers up like a foundation. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: white powdery stuff when blot
customer_reviews.text: This brand has been around forever and I thought I couldn't go wrong w these! I am an oily girl and am always looking for new products to help with that. I should have read reviews before buying ..... Sure they work....BUT YOU WILL HAVE WHITE POWDER ON THE PART OF THE FACE YOU BLOTTED :/
customer_reviews.author: amber montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Leave a powdery residue on my face.
customer_reviews.text: These work good, but they always leave a powdery resodue in my face regardless of which side I use. I live near Houston where the humidity is sky high. This might work better in other regions.
customer_reviews.author: TxTeacher

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I'm surprised these rice papers were so much smaller than what they used to be, it's disappointing. I think they are overpriced for the size they now are. I think there are fewer in them then before. I thought they were going to be the same size they used to be.
customer_reviews.author: I love Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Great absorption, good for pale skin
customer_reviews.text: The absorption is great, and the light powder is the perfect shade for my very pale skin. I don't wear makeup, so I can say that it doesn't leave a dramatic powdery look, just a nice subtle matte to my skin. It's my favorite face blotting paper I've ever tried!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Meh...😞 (I wouldn't waste my money)
customer_reviews.text: The paper literally feels like a thick piece of letter paper. It also leaves chalky residue EVERYWHERE! (On your face and your clothes.) It absorbs shine okay, but I've had better results with other papers.
customer_reviews.author: KMoses

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: These are the best blotting sheets that I have ever used and I'm thrilled to be able to bulk buy them like this. These really absorb oil well and since they have powder on one side of them it's simple to blot and powder with one little sheet and be done with your touch up in just seconds. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: mmallia

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, but not great
customer_reviews.text: I think this item was in storage for some time. I’ve bought this product several times before from a beauty supply store with no issues. For this item, the powder came off the paper in chunks, leaving bits of white debris on my face and lips. It blotted away oil somewhat successfully, but kind of ruined my makeup on days I’ve used it.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this 2 in 1 product. First absorb oil then apply powder. You may use one or 2 in one application, but 2 is not necessarily a requirement. I bought it in bulk both for the pricing and to have one in every one of my bags!
customer_reviews.author: Neumifly

customer_reviews.title: Different but useful
customer_reviews.text: I usually use the kind of blotting tissues that are basically tissue paper. This is different but gets the job done and is softer on the skin. The powder does get kind of everywhere and can make your face look patchy if it's uneven.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s amazing and great to have in your arsenal if you ...
customer_reviews.text: This is eye opening. I’ve used the various blue oil wipes (clean & clear, and all the various generics copying this product). This wipe had powder embedded on the wipe so that you have extra protection and mattification. It’s amazing and great to have in your arsenal if you were cursed with EXTREMELY constant oily skin like myself.
customer_reviews.author: White Noise

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I think these are the best blotting papers out there on the market. It's a two in one. Not only does it remove all the oil from your face, it also puts a thin layer of oil controlling powder on your face. I hate looking like I caked on powder and this stuff is great. I'm fair to medium in skin tone and have not had any problems with the color. I've used Natural and Translucent. These are so much better than anything else out there. They can usually be found in your Sally's Beauty Supply store.
customer_reviews.author: VeeSki

customer_reviews.title: too rough
customer_reviews.text: Too rough for my oily skin and at same time rips easily. Back to clean and clear I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Ramiro Alonso

customer_reviews.title: Trash.
customer_reviews.text: These are garbage!!! I bought them because of great reviews but was so confused when I tried them as to why they are reviewed so highly! I went to use one and it tore immediately. They are junk and I’m super disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lyoung614

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to use midday to blot oil t zone and receive coverage for the rest of day. My daughter uses them as foundation for the day, she puts on facial lotion then blots face and she is good for the day.
customer_reviews.author: Faye Johnson

customer_reviews.title: A midday makeup lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these. When a certain beauty retailer stopped selling my favorite powdered blotting papers, I didn't know where to look! Thankfully, I found these. While they're a little bit more expensive than the last product, I only need 1 to keep my whole face looking freshly powdered and clean whereas the others sometimes took 2 or 3. The size of these is perfect, and very high quality. Will purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: swit0028

customer_reviews.title: Shine has met it's match
customer_reviews.text: I have extremely oily skin, so oily that I look sweaty after a couple of hours. But these little babies help keep the dreaded shine away. This is an essential part of my morning routine. I dab my face with these and the paper is saturated with oils. But I don't just use these in the morning, I also use them before I go out. Just a few quick dabs and I'm all set. If you have oily skin, keep these close by and say bye-bye to shine
customer_reviews.author: Gladys LadybugonWheels

customer_reviews.title: Like it so much I bought my third package!
customer_reviews.text: My can’t live without it beauty product is oil absorbing sheets. Stumbled upon these which both absorb oil and deposit some color by way of a very light powder. The sheets are large so I use half of one for each application. Love this product!
customer_reviews.author: PattyE

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this product!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product. On a hot/ humid day my face gets all greasy & shiney looking and blotting one of the rice paper sheets over my skin eliminates the problem without disturbing my makeup or adding any additional color or residue.
customer_reviews.author: Marian

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for hot humid Texas weather!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to put in the bathroom guest basket at my daughters wedding. Perfect for blotting the sweat and oils without smudging the makeup! My younger daughter that's a Cosmetologist says these are the best!!
customer_reviews.author: Marg

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Oil Blotting sheets
customer_reviews.text: My oils are so bad you could use my oils to fry food. I absolutely LOVE these oil blotting sheets. They give you a beautiful matte finish without removing your makeup. With other oil blotting sheets I’d have to use about 4 sheets just to get my oils under control. With this brand, I only need one. Love it and will buy again!!
customer_reviews.author: SABRINA LOPEZ

customer_reviews.title: Delivers on its promise!
customer_reviews.text: I have not been this satisfied with a beauty purchase in a long time. This product does exactly what it says it’s gonna do, which isn’t often the case. By the end of the work day my skin is always oily in the T-Zone. A few blots with these absorbs oil all of the oil and leaves my skin matte and smooth for the rest of the day! I bought the translucent and it does leave a bit of a powdery residue behind, but that comes off fairly easily when brushed off.
customer_reviews.author: mario morrison

customer_reviews.title: These are amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these things. Ive always had some issues with using oil sheets because I feel like they take up some of my makeup in the process, but since these have some powder on them I feel as though they make my makeup look fresh again right after use. I really do recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: iPhonensbsbsjbs

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I have many years using this product and it is great, but is the first time I get it from Amazon. I have oily skin and this rice paper absors the oil and at the same time powder my face.
customer_reviews.author: MIRIAM

customer_reviews.title: Not usable.
customer_reviews.text: They literally rip apart into pieces trying to get them out of the package and then continue ripping as you try to wipe your face. Not really usable.
customer_reviews.author: S-S

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best rice papers to remove shine and oil from your face! I've been using them for nearly 20 years. I like the translucent shade because it does not interfere with your make up and you can use them all year round, no matter if you are tan in the summer or your paler winter skin color. Just awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine R. Yacola

customer_reviews.title: Absorbs well
customer_reviews.text: Initially not sure if the "rice paper" would work to absorb oil but it turned out better than I thought. Used it all in my walking tour of the Tuscan area and it absorbed well and kept me from dripping sweat from my nose.
customer_reviews.author: shortnsweet

customer_reviews.title: A must have for your purse!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I hadn't used these rice papers in years so when it came up as a referred product I immediately bought it. It takes the skin off your face with no residue left behind.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Christian

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I just really love this product and used to get it at ULTA but they discontinued it so I am happy it's sold here. Sheets are ticker than other brands and that is helpful for oil absorption.
customer_reviews.author: D.Ge.We

customer_reviews.title: Very effective to remove oil from face
customer_reviews.text: I love it, my nose is very oily with this papers I can take care of it, I love it in my entire face it.
customer_reviews.author: YSoto

customer_reviews.title: Dusty dust
customer_reviews.text: The package was beautiful. The papers on the other hand....have a powder that sometimes comes off as big spots on your face that are hard to wipe off, plus the powder dusts off when taking a sheet out. So hopefully you dont wear all black like i do lol(not really funny super inconvenient😥)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for MY skintype
customer_reviews.text: This worked really well for me and I carry it everywhere; however, I offered one to a darker-skinned coworker of mine so she could test it out and she was left with pale streaks across her face where she had rubbed. I am have very fair skin so this is not a problem for me but I definitely would not recommend it for anyone with darker or even pretty tanned skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Kass

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Not soft at all but I’m only used to the clean and clear ones I used in high school lol. They absorbed oil very well.
customer_reviews.author: Crys

customer_reviews.title: Love them! Will repurchase
customer_reviews.text: No matter what bulletproof products I use, I’m oily by 1 pm every day. I use these on my face to blot my extra oil without removing my makeup I have in place. They’re amazing and I can’t live without them!
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: Worst blot papers
customer_reviews.text: These things are terrible. They fall apart in your hand the moment you start blotting and powder gets everywhere without blending into your skin. worst blot papers I have ever purchased. WASTE OF MONEY.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If your mascara runs !!!  Buy these!  No more Coon eyes
customer_reviews.text: Stopped my make up from running!!!!! After spending over 600.00. This simple solution solverd every problem!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ramy

customer_reviews.title: Not bad.
customer_reviews.text: These papers are good at absorbing oil & I like having the option to use the makeup side or the other. I feel the powder can sometimes look too flaky, so I use the back on occasion instead. I ordered and use the powder as well, but it can be messy. I just keep in upright in my glove box for touch-ups. They weren't life-changing, but they do their job.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy these at Walmart years ago and couldn’t find them for a while. I’m glad I did because I just moved from NJ to FL and my skin has been so oily. I am constantly on the go and work on my feet so they are perfect for when you want to freshen up on break really quickly! I recommend using the powdery side when you have makeup on, but I like to use both sides to try to get extra absorbency
customer_reviews.author: Ashley MacHugh

customer_reviews.title: Hands down the best!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these for years. No other product on the market is better. I keep a pack in my makeup bag, purse and at my desk at work. Love them that much!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Montes

customer_reviews.title: DONT WASTE THE MONEY
customer_reviews.text: I have used MANY blotter tissues-high end/low end and now these. First, these do NOT blot anything-the also have fragrance bad for sensitive or acne prone skin. They are the WORST I have used to date. Might as well use a regular piece of paper to blot your face. Waste of money-
customer_reviews.author: Erica Chitwood

customer_reviews.title: this is always my best rice paper for my oily skin
customer_reviews.text: this is always my best rice paper for my oily skin! I can not remember how many times I keep re-ordering this. It clear the oil that looks too shiny on my face and it helps to keep it clean and prevent the acne I used to have before using Palladio product!
customer_reviews.author: angie bach

customer_reviews.title: I stock up on them.
customer_reviews.text: My go to blotting papers! I have a very oily skin type and I love that this absorbs good and has powder on it for that extra matte look.
customer_reviews.author: Lam Fam

customer_reviews.title: Takes off makeup
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't do what I had hoped it would... tried to blot away excess oil but it ended up removing my makeup instead. Made my skin look blotchy and just awful. I liked the idea of this product a lot since it has a side with powder, but I was just so disappointed. Tossed the whole thing away.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: So great for on the go touch ups.
customer_reviews.text: Works well for oily skin. And even just to take the shine off. I always keep some in my purse!
customer_reviews.author: EM

customer_reviews.title: Sooo there is white powder on them.... who knew.
customer_reviews.text: I guess indidnt realize that rice paper has white powder all over them. I am used to blotting papers. I am brown. The white powder did NOT work. I threw them in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: P brown

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for powder foundation
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I wear a powder foundation and they absorb oil and touch up my make up at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail McInturff

customer_reviews.title: Very oil absorption
customer_reviews.text: These are super helpful most oil sheets take your make up off not this one it’s perfect!!!
customer_reviews.author: myra

customer_reviews.title: YESSSSSS
customer_reviews.text: Palladio still has the best blotting sheets on the market. Soaks up oil and powders your face at the same time! I always have pack in my car, backpack, and purse. Ive always taken these along with me as a bridesmaid in weddings and the bride and bridesmaids have thanked me every time! Hope these are never discontinued.
customer_reviews.author: ellie

customer_reviews.title: Helps with shiny skin
customer_reviews.text: I always struggle with oily skin. After trying many products that are supposed to relieve oily skin, I always run back to these. I have tried the wipes without the powder, but these are much better because the powder allows the skin to stay matte much longer.
customer_reviews.author: Sawbow

customer_reviews.title: One of the best products for oily skin
customer_reviews.text: I love these and have used them for a while. They are great for keeping your makeup looking fresh. Unlike a lot of oil blotting papers, they are powdered so it doesn’t pull any makeup off or separate it. Only complaint is that the package doesn’t stay shut sometimes. But that’s not a big deal for me, still a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn Harrison

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: i love these! they don’t affect my makeup and they are such a great price
customer_reviews.author: Geenie

customer_reviews.title: Great with make up!
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend these to use when you have make up on! I am in love with this product. My face always tends to get oily half way through the day, but I just use one sheet and it mattifies my face instantly! I got this in the “shade” natural, my skin is a bit darker and warmer, and the powder doesn’t wash me out at all!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Necessary!
customer_reviews.text: I always keep these in my purse. I have very oily skin and these are so incredibly handy, and they don't rub off your makeup. I've been buying these for years and years.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin Jeter

customer_reviews.title: buy in bulk
customer_reviews.text: great product. smell is very subtle -- i have a sensitive nose and can hardly smell it. only problem is that product tears easily. np, buy in bulk. however, my face feels great. overall, great buy for the price. 2/3 as many as other packages of similar wipes for less than 1/2 the cost.
customer_reviews.author: A Guy From Texas

customer_reviews.title: A Nice Papier Poudre.
customer_reviews.text: These are a nicely made, effective, and affordable papier poudre. It shipped quickly, and I will repurchase. For reference, I'm 43 with combination skin.
customer_reviews.author: DrHLeighTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: This rice paper tissues are perfect. I recommended 100%. This is my second time buying and I will keep purchasing because absorbes the oil but doesn’t leave patches on my face.
customer_reviews.author: BLOUNT

customer_reviews.title: Ummmm no
customer_reviews.text: It’s a no for me. To much white powdery substance left on face
customer_reviews.author: KAMERON

customer_reviews.title: Great blotting paper! Different and works well!
customer_reviews.text: Able to blot out my oiliness in my T zone but watch out for excessive powder and look at yourself in thw mirror afterwards just in case.
customer_reviews.author: M.L.

customer_reviews.title: My go-to
customer_reviews.text: I love these so much and they're perfect for on the go when you're feeling shiny. Will be buying again!
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth

customer_reviews.title: Save my make-up during summer time
customer_reviews.text: During summer, I sweat a lot and my face tends to be oily after couple hours wearing make-up. This is the best option that helps me to get matte looking face whole day! I blot my face like twice a day and then don't have to use the powder foundation again. I'll definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: iCeCrEaM

customer_reviews.title: Good product, best in the market
customer_reviews.text: Good product, best in the market. I used to buy them at Meijie, but they don't carry it anymore. I'm glad I find it here on Amazon
customer_reviews.author: D. YEUNG

customer_reviews.title: Best thing. For oily skin
customer_reviews.text: I have oily T zone. So. This is. Great. Absorbed all. The oil in my skin. I can. Used. In the middle of the. Day. And. Awesome no more shiny skin love.
customer_reviews.author: Hyan Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for shiny noses like mine
customer_reviews.text: Love these to absorb the oil on my T zone. I keep a pack in all my purses. They sometimes are a little wrinkled/overlapped in the dispenser but no biggie. I’m glad they have them on amazon so I don’t have to go all the way to the beauty supply store just for these.
customer_reviews.author: Izzy & Nat Perez

customer_reviews.title: Best stuff around!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this rice paper for close to 20 years. It is the only type of product on the market that does what it's supposed to! I cried tears of sadness when Harmons stopped selling it in their stores. But alas...there will always be Amazon ;)
customer_reviews.author: Marisa

customer_reviews.title: Removes the shine without adding more product on my face
customer_reviews.text: This product is perfect at getting rid of the shine on my face and is small enough to fit into my tiniest purse. Love this product definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Nichole

customer_reviews.title: Get these!! You will love them.
customer_reviews.text: These are easily the BEST on the market. Nice rice powder transfer to matte perfection after taking away all oil. Been using for years. Give as gifts. This is a terrific product!
customer_reviews.author: Lucy sky blue

customer_reviews.title: These are the best
customer_reviews.text: I've used a few different brands, Clean & Clear, The Target knock off version of the Clean & Clear sheets. These are by far the best. They do have a baby powder smell. But did you know the Clean & Clear sheets and off brand sheets have MINERAL OIL? They're actually making your oil shine worse! These are excellent, they have almost a talc powder substance on them to help control shine. One of these will last me all day.
customer_reviews.author: Ace

customer_reviews.title: Helpful for quick touch ups
customer_reviews.text: Great for a quick touch up in the middle of the day to eliminate shine. It has a powdered side and a non powdered side that both absorb oil. Works well.
customer_reviews.author: K. Legates

customer_reviews.title: NOT THE REAL PRODUCT BUT STILL WORKS (also good for the price)
customer_reviews.text: I bought this about a year ago because I was surprised at how cheap it was (they're usually $5 a pack and this is 6 packs for $20), but the rice paper is more thinner than the real product. The real product has thicker rice paper. BUT I would still recommend because of the price and it STILL works pretty good. I have very oily skin and this gets rid of the oil. I use it about 2-3 a day. It's a must-have for me now.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Pham

customer_reviews.title: Best to de-shine your mug.
customer_reviews.text: Great for soaking up the shine, without messing with your makeups. Just blot paper against your shiny face & voila.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon K

customer_reviews.title: works so well it looks like im wearing makeup
customer_reviews.text: i ordered the 3 pack and received the 3 pack. i have oily skin and so these are a MUST for me. works so well it looks like im wearing makeup. get it !!
customer_reviews.author: chelle

customer_reviews.title: My favorite paper!!
customer_reviews.text: This rice paper for blotting oil is great for me. After using it makes my face feel matte like! Ive been using these sheets for 4 years now!!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Best oil absorbent sheets
customer_reviews.text: Love these, doesn't disrupt my makeup but takes aways excess oil perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela Del-Cid

customer_reviews.title: HOLY GRAIL PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a lot of face blotting sheets and this, by far, is the most effective of them all! The rice powder absorbs all the oil and leaves my face with a matte finish. This product is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Ira G

customer_reviews.title: Use carefully
customer_reviews.text: These sheets definitely absorb oil from your face. I don't like that they leave rice powder residue on your face and/or clothes
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Love Love Love! I have been using these for years and could no longer find them in the beauty store. They are beyond fantastic and work great on my ‘glistening’ (well, very oily) skin. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: AMBER

customer_reviews.title: Not the same quality.
customer_reviews.text: First box was great but second not so much. Stays caked on the areas that are oily.
customer_reviews.author: Franciele

customer_reviews.title: These are so good for oily skin
customer_reviews.text: These are so good for oily skin, and I love the translucent powder that adds a good matte finish to my makeup. Perfect carrying size, though they can be slightly messy when pulling them out. Overall no allergic reactions, & works well with my skin!
customer_reviews.author: Punpunia

customer_reviews.title: Helps to cover shine
customer_reviews.text: Works well to cover any shine. Powder is nice, but can leave residue if you do not check yourself after applying.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: They Do Blot The Oil From Your Face
customer_reviews.text: These papers are on the thick side, and they do a satisfactory job of blotting the oil off your face.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Absorbs oil
customer_reviews.text: My face is super oily. I've tried several tissue papers and these have worked the best. I use them a couple times a day. I keep a pack in the car and in my purse at all times.
customer_reviews.author: P.

product_meta.title: Palladio Rice Paper Tissues, Translucent, Face Blotting Sheets with Natural Rice Powder, 40 Count, Pack of 1
product_meta.description: Size:Pack of 1| Color:TranslucentThese very unique tissues are made from natural rice and provide the same, great oil-absorbing functions as our Rice Powder-in a more compact form. Packaged in a handy component, these tissues will fit inside even in the smallest purse or pocket, so you'll never have to leave home without them!
feature_bullets: RICE PAPER BLOTTING TISSUES: Made from natural rice, Palladio's rice paper sheets are great for absorbing excess oil & keeping your face & makeup looking fresh & clean all day—at home or traveling. Comes in compact packaging & in multiple skin tones.

OIL ABSORBING RICE POWDER: Used for beauty & skin care for generations, rice powder is known for its ability to absorb oil & help makeup last longer. Palladio carries a rice powder product line, including rice paper blotting tissues, powder, & primer.

CRUELTY & PARABEN FREE MAKEUP & COSMETICS: From blotting paper & rice powder to primer, foundation, & blush, eye makeup & lip colors, as well as a variety of makeup brushes & blending sponges, Palladio products help you create the finished look you want.

PROFESSIONAL MAKEUP & BEAUTY PRODUCTS: Palladio's line of beauty and makeup products are professional quality, made for makeup artists and home use. Use Palladio botanical and vitamin infused cosmetics as the foundation of a flawlessly finished look.

PALLADIO QUALITY: Compare Palladio rice paper to products from KANA, Andrea Face Q's, The Face Shop, Bella Jade, Pleasing Care, Maiko, NYX, Clean & Clear, Schon, too cool for school, Oh!My Muse, LiveFresh, Day by Day Beauty, SHANY, Tatcha, & Shiseido.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
